info.name: CRM Kilang Desa Murni Batik
info.description:
Complete API collection for CRM Kilang Desa Murni Batik - A multi-tenant CRM system built with Go microservices.

## Getting Started

1. Import this collection into Postman
2. Import the environment file (CRM_Environment.postman_environment.json)
3. Update the `base_url` in the environment to your API gateway URL
4. Use the Login endpoint to get access tokens
5. Tokens are automatically saved to environment variables

## Services

- **IAM Service**: Authentication, users, roles, tenants
- **Customer Service**: Customers, contacts, notes, activities, segments
- **Sales Service**: Leads, opportunities, deals, pipelines
- **Notification Service**: Templates, email/SMS sending

## Authentication

All endpoints (except login/register) require Bearer token authentication. The collection automatically sets the `access_token` after successful login.

item.name: IAM Service
item.description: Identity and Access Management - Authentication, Users, Roles, and Tenants

request.description: Authenticate and receive JWT tokens. Access token is automatically saved to environment.
Refresh access token using refresh token
List all users with pagination and filters
Get roles assigned to a user
Assign a role to a user
Remove a role from a user
Get all permissions for a user (aggregated from roles)

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Sales Representative",
    "description": "Sales team member with limited access",
    "permissions": [
        "leads:read",
        "leads:create",
        "leads:update",
        "customers:read",
        "opportunities:read",
        "opportunities:create"
    ]
}

request.description: Get all users assigned to a role
Check if a tenant slug is available
Get tenant public info by slug

item.name: Customer Service
item.description: Customer management, contacts, notes, activities, and segments

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Acme Corporation",
    "email": "sales@acme.com",
    "phone": "+60123456789",
    "company": "Acme Corp Sdn Bhd",
    "industry": "Technology",
    "website": "https://acme.com",
    "address": {
        "street": "123 Main Street",
        "city": "Kuala Lumpur",
        "state": "Wilayah Persekutuan",
        "postal_code": "50000",
        "country": "Malaysia"
    },
    "tags": ["enterprise", "technology"]
}

request.description: Add a contact to a customer
List all contacts for a customer
Set a contact as the primary contact
Add a note to a customer
List all notes for a customer
Pin a note to the top

body.raw:
{
    "type": "call",
    "title": "Follow-up call",
    "description": "Discussed pricing options and next steps",
    "duration_minutes": 30,
    "outcome": "positive"
}

request.description: Log an activity for a customer
List all activities for a customer
Refresh segment membership for dynamic segments
Get all customers in a segment
Manually add a customer to a segment
Remove a customer from a segment
Get errors from an import job

item.name: Sales Service
item.description: Sales pipeline management - Leads, Opportunities, Deals, and Pipelines

body.raw:
{
    "first_name": "Jane",
    "last_name": "Smith",
    "email": "jane.smith@example.com",
    "phone": "+60123456789",
    "company": "Tech Startup Sdn Bhd",
    "title": "Marketing Director",
    "source": "website",
    "industry": "Technology",
    "website": "https://techstartup.com",
    "notes": "Interested in enterprise plan"
}

request.description: Get leads assigned to a specific owner
Get leads with high scores (hot leads)
Get leads with no activity for specified days
Convert lead to customer and/or opportunity

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Enterprise CRM Implementation",
    "customer_id": "{{customer_id}}",
    "value": 75000,
    "stage_id": "{{stage_id}}",
    "probability": 60,
    "expected_close_date": "2024-06-30",
    "notes": "Large enterprise deal with potential for expansion"
}

request.description: Move opportunity to a different stage
Add a stage to a pipeline

body.raw:
{ "name": "Welcome Email", "type": "email", "subject": "Welcome to CRM Kilang Desa Murni Batik!", "body": "

Welcome, {{name}}!

We're excited to have you on board.

", "variables": ["name", "company"] }
